articles.title: Human brains are getting larger. That may be good news for dementia risk - UC Davis Health
articles.description: A new study published in JAMA Neurology found human brains are getting bigger. The increased size may lead to a brain reserve, potentially reducing the risk of dementia.
articles.content: (SACRAMENTO) A new study by researchers at UC Davis Health found human brains are getting larger. Study participants born in the 1970s had 6.6% larger brain volumes and almost 15% larger brain surfac… [+3918 chars]
